How do I go about joining a Faction?

It's not cheap! If I put in a good word for you, it will cost 250,000ru, but, knowing you, well, just don't go and piss anyone off, or else it will cost even more to get them off your back. At least another 100,000ru, just guessing.
Duty have put a price on my head, can you get them off my back!?
I want to join Duty.
Freedom's out to kill me, Can you help me out!?
I wish to join Freedom.
I need to restore an amicable relationship with the Neutrals.
Ahh, crap, just forget it.

These services don't come cheap you know. The more problems you stir up with a Faction, the more money it will cost to restore your relations with them.
Give me a minute to check on it for you.
There, it's done!
Are you certain that you wanted to do this?

I'm told that you really pissed these guys off! You really need to bring it down a notch Marked One! I won't always be able to bail you out like this. Try and remember this conversation the next time you go 'Chackie Chan' on people, Eh.
Yes, I want to restore my relationship with Duty.
Yes, sign me up with Duty!
Yes, I want to restore my relationship with Freedom.
Yes, sign me up with Freedom!
Yes, I want to restore my relationship with the stalkers.
All is well that ends well, THANK YOU!!
I wish to convert to the Monolithian faith.
Yes, I want you to put me in touch with the Monolith.
I've heard that the Military are taking new recruits.
Yes, you heard correctly, why, you totaly lost it!? You're NOT serious, are you?!!
I want you to put me in touch with the Bandits.
Yea, Yea, I understand perfectly.
I wish to become a loner once again.
Yea, Yea, I understand perfectly.
I have decided to become a Mercenary!
Put me in touch with the Mercs.
Can you put me in touch with the Scientists?
Yes, I want to help the Scientists, feel it's my duty! Maybe even get an education, and not just a job, but, a career!
